ul.li: The employment contract is Project Staff the first three months is probation period.
The employment is full-time 8 hours including one-hour lunch break and five days a week.
For specific job responsibilities please refer to the Job Description of this position.
Upon signing this contract, the staff also confirms that she/he has read and understood the SCA Code of Conduct and security and safety instructions and will adhere to confidentiality.
The salary is according to the approved SCA Salary Scale.
The employee is liable for paying income tax and SCA facilitates tax deduction.
The contract can be cancelled by both parties by written notice of one month.
According to SHB the employee is entitled for health insurance.
The employee is not entitled for pension as per provision of SHB.
Redundancy package is only applicable provided the budget is available and donor doesn’t prohibit
The employee is insured to a maximum amount of Afs 400,000 for death and/or permanent disabilities on case-by-case basis
SCA will have no employer responsibilities towards the employee when contract ends.
